data.title: Amazing service

data.text:
This hotel was great, mainly because of the friendliness and charm of the staff. Especially Mr. Amr. His hospital was 5 star. He really made our stay special. 

Restaurant staff were amazing. 

Family room was spacious and clean.

Entertainment could be improved by introducing an indoor dj till early hours of the morning. 

More quality drinks are needed for the all inclusive option. 

Mini bar should be replenished daily not just on arrival. 

Overall, good value for money.
data.title: A great stay

data.text:
Best Value for Money holiday I have ever booked. The hotel is undergoing massive renovations and although the room I was given had not yet been upgraded the rest of the hotel and staff made up for it. 

Hotel has an army of staff for cleaning / serving which means you never have to wait to get served and all hotel grounds are very well maintained. 

There is a huge variety of fish on the hotel’s private beach so if you like snorkelling you will have a great time. They also have a jetty and when the sea is calm you can snorkel for free next to a reef that falls 30 meter deep. It’s an amazing sight. 

If you experience any issues then I recommend you immediately bring it to the attention of staff as they were very good in handling all my issues/requests promptly.   The entire hotel staff were absolutely amazing and this made the holiday much more enjoyable. 

They never ask for tips but I do recommend you take some change and tip staff given the quality of service they give! 

I also liked the fact that although I was staying in the Aqua gardens I could use the restaurants and bars of other two adjacent resorts at no extra cost. You get similar food in all of them but it’s nice for a change of atmosphere. 

My kids also loved the kids Disco as the animation team did a great job with the respect to entertaining the kids.
data.title: Best Value for Money and Amazing Staff

data.text:
Stayed at the Charmillion Gardens Aqua Park Hotel with the family in October 2023. 
We arrived relatively late on our check-in day and were Greeted by Mina at the reception. The main reception is situated in the Charmillion  Sealife Resort (which is literally opposite Charmillion Garden - about 50 steps away).
Mina was very helpful during the check and explained things thoroughly regarding our stay. We were offered a late dinner at 11pm due to our check in time. 
We'd booked two family rooms, and were provided with exactly that. An added bonus was that they were connecting rooms which was perfect for our family. 
It is obvious that the the resort is regularly well maintained. 
During our stay, ALL staff were incredibly helpful and there to support and aid wherever necessary. Some mentions (there were many more) to: Ahmed from housekeeping (in Block 44**) was superb and demonstrated kindness at all times. He showed real integrity as returning some valuable items that we'd left in the room once we'd checked out. 
Mahmoud Farhat in the Garden Guest service went out of his way to help us. 
Mavdi from the shop situated behind the Sealife Reception was very helpful in the mobile queries we had. 
Mohammed Kamal and in the Lebanese restaurant did everything he could to make it a memorable experience for the children. 
Hossam was fab from the Japanese restaurant. 
Finally, Ahmed Khairy was an absolute gem. He went above and beyond to ensure everything was ok. From helping to make a reservation in arabic, to adhering to any requests we had. He and the other staff would constantly check-in with us to ensure our stay was going as perfectly as we'd want.

In terms of the resort, we stayed at the Gardens. This had an awesome aqua park with around 9 thrilling slides. It also had a pool and a billiards table (chargeable). However, we were able to use either the gardens restaurant or the one opposite in the Sealife resort. 
Food was plentiful and full of variety. 
You get 1 or 2 A la Carte resturant visits during your stay, depending on the length of your stay.We chose lebanese and japanese, both fabulous. 

The beach is in the Sealife resort - about a 10 minute walk. 
The Spa is situated on the 3rd hotel (Club Aqua), around 10 walk from Gardens. We were kindly assisted with a buggy due to the makeup of our group. 

There is no wifi in the rooms, only in the lobby areas of sealife and gardens. However, you can buy a sim for around $10 with enough data to last a week. 

Naama bay - the main centre is about a 15 minute taxi ride away. I found it cheaper booking taxis through booking.com

Excursions from the hotel are dearer then other local companies. 

The last day we were able to have a later check out, this was massively helpful.

On the whole, we had an amazing experience. Thank you to all the staff. Our whole family loved the stay and we'd return again.
data.title: Excellent stay
